_important_notes: CRITICAL: You MUST use the official Content IDs from SerialStation or the PS4 will reject the package with error CE-34707-1
Each official Rocksmith DLC has a unique Content ID assigned by Sony/Ubisoft
Generated/random Content IDs will NOT work - they must match the official database
If a song is not in SerialStation, it may be a custom/unofficial DLC that needs a properly formatted but unique ID
Content IDs must be EXACTLY 36 characters: REGION-CUSA00745_00-XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
The last 16 characters (XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX) are unique to each DLC
